dmca.title: Complaint
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Ashlee Parker [mailto:ashlee.parker@gmail.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2007 1:49 AM
To: Legal Response; abuse
Subject: Complaint



A web server in your datacenter is hosting ChristianDL.com which
contains illegal software, music, games, and videos.  If the database is
not removed within 24 hours, we will file legal action against ThePlanet
Hosting.  The Digital Millennium Copyright Act prohibits the
distribution of devices whose intended use, is to bypass an access or
copy control put in place by a copyright owner. 

We thank you for your cooperation and hope that the situation can be
remedied as soon as possible.
Ashlee
